0.text: Innate:  Mantra's current cooldown is  reduced by 5 seconds for each enemy champion hit by Karma's damaging abilities.
0.html: Innate: Mantra's current cooldown is  reduced by 5 seconds for each enemy champion hit by Karma's damaging abilities.

0.text: TARGET RANGE:  950 /  890
Active: Karma fires a bolt in the target direction that explodes on the first enemy hit, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and  slowing them by 35% for 1.5 seconds.
0.html: Active: Karma fires a bolt in the target direction that explodes on the first enemy hit, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and slowing them by 35% for 1.5 seconds.

0.text: EFFECT RADIUS:  280
Mantra Bonus: Inner Flame deals increased damage, and fires a larger bolt that also explodes at maximum range.
0.html: Mantra Bonus: Inner Flame deals increased damage, and fires a larger bolt that also explodes at maximum range.

1.text: The explosion creates a field for 1.5 seconds that  slows enemies within by 50%, which then ruptures to deal magic damage.
1.html: The explosion creates a field for 1.5 seconds that slows enemies within by 50%, which then ruptures to deal magic damage.

2.html: Soulflare scales with Mantra's rank.

0.text: TARGET RANGE:  675
Active: Karma deals magic damage to the target enemy  champion or  monster and forms a  tether between her and them for 2 seconds, during which the target is also  revealed.
0.html: Active: Karma deals magic damage to the target enemy champion or monster and forms a tether between her and them for 2 seconds, during which the target is also revealed.

1.text: If the tether is not broken by the end of its duration, the target is dealt the same magic damage again and is  rooted for a duration, during which they are  revealed.
1.html: If the tether is not broken by the end of its duration, the target is dealt the same magic damage again and is rooted for a duration, during which they are revealed.

0.text: Mantra Bonus: Focused Resolve's  root duration is increased. Karma  heals for  17% (+ 1% per 100 AP) of her missing health once on-cast, and again once the tether lasts its full duration or the target dies while tethered.
0.html:
Mantra Bonus: Focused Resolve's root duration is increased.

Karma heals for  17% (+ 1% per 100 AP) of her missing health once on-cast, and again once the tether lasts its full duration or the target dies while tethered.

1.html: Renewal scales with Mantra's rank.

0.text: TARGET RANGE:  800
Active: Karma applies a  shield on herself or the target allied champion for 2.5 seconds, which grants  40% bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds.
0.html: Active: Karma applies a shield on herself or the target allied champion for 2.5 seconds, which grants  40% bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds.

0.text: EFFECT RADIUS:  700
Mantra - Active: Inspire's shield is increased. Inspire spreads to surrounding allied champions at 30% effectiveness.Secondary targets receive 12% bonus movement speed.
0.html:
Mantra - Active: Inspire's shield is increased.

Inspire spreads to surrounding allied champions at 30% effectiveness.
Secondary targets receive 12% bonus movement speed.

1.html: Defiance scales with Mantra's rank.

0.text: CAST TIME: NONE
Active: Karma empowers her next basic ability within 8 seconds for an additional effect. Mantra can be used while affected by  cast-inhibiting crowd control.
0.html:
Active: Karma empowers her next basic ability within 8 seconds for an additional effect.

Mantra can be used while affected by cast-inhibiting crowd control.

1.text: Karma begins the game with one rank in Mantra. Her empowered abilities scale based on Mantra's rank.

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+8 ability power
+10 health
+50% base mana regeneration
+ 2 per 10 seconds

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Tribute: Grants a charge every 10 seconds, up to 3 charges. If an allied champion is nearby, damaging abilities and attacks against champions and structures consume a charge, up to one per attack or cast. Consuming a charge grants 20. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.
Unique – Quest: Earn 500 using this item to upgrade to Frostfang, gaining the Warding active with 3 wards in stock.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – TRIBUTE: Grants a charge every 10 seconds, up to 3 charges. If an allied champion is nearby, damaging abilities and attacks against champions and structures consume a charge, up to one per attack or cast. Consuming a charge grants  20. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+40 ability power
+20 ability haste
+200 health
+100% base mana regeneration

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Inspire: Grants you and all allies within 1000 units of you 30% bonus movement speed for 4 seconds (75 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – INSPIRE: Grants you and all allies within 1000 units of you 30% bonus movement speed for 4 seconds (75 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Motivate: Healing, shielding, or buffing allied champions (excluding yourself) grants you and them 25% bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds (4 (per champion) second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 ability haste.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – MOTIVATE:  Healing,  shielding, or buffing allied champions (excluding yourself) grants you and them 25% bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds (4 (per champion) second cooldown).

1.originHTML: +  +  750

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Puffcap Toxin: Dealing magic damage to enemy champions inflicts them with 25% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds. Healing or shielding allied champions (excluding yourself) empowers your and their next instance of damage against enemy champions within 5 seconds to apply 40% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – PUFFCAP TOXIN: Dealing magic damage to enemy champions inflicts them with 25%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.  Healing or  shielding allied champions (excluding yourself) empowers your and their next instance of damage against enemy champions within 5 seconds to apply 40%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.

Active

Unique – Stasis: Put yourself in stasis for 2.5 seconds, rendering you untargetable and invulnerable for the duration but also unable to move, declare basic attacks, cast abilities, use summoner spells, or activate items (120 second cooldown).

Stats

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Intervention: Call upon a beam of light to strike upon the target location after 2.5 seconds, granting sight of the area for the duration. Allies within the area are healed for 180 − 340 (based on target's level), while enemy champions within take 10% of target's maximum health as true damage. Can be used while dead. (90 second cooldown; 5500 range).
active.originText: UNIQUE – INTERVENTION: Call upon a beam of light to strike upon the target location after 2.5 seconds, granting  sight of the area for the duration.
